name: MIIGLE
tag_list: social-network, crowdsource, crowdfund, social-innovation, startup, entrepreneur
overview:
Miigle is a social innovation platform that helps entrepreneurs around the world crowdsource from people who share their interests, the knowledge, support, talent, and money they need to grow and promote their startups or projects.

Learn more at www.miigle.com

Ever had a business idea but gave up because you didn’t know how to get started? Or you launched a startup but lost traction because it was difficult or too expensive to attract the right audience?

Everyday, countless promising startup ideas die prematurely and most often unnoticed because millions of entrepreneurs around the world find it nearly impossible to access the knowledge, support, mentorship, and money they need to foster their creativity.

Miigle offers a platform where entrepreneurs globally can connect and leverage each other’s savoir-faire as well as solicit from the general public, including investors and mentors, the knowledge, support, mentorship, and funding they need. Miigle was conceived on the belief that the potential of our collective genius is truly infinite if we utilize the world’s diversity as a tool for collaboration.

We’d like to invite you to be part of this exciting journey. We hope you join us and bring some friends along.

Let’s Miigle!
